Text:
It will be interesting to see how this version compares to the version made in - you guessed it - 1984.  The 1984 version features John Hurt as the lead character, Winston.

Great find, Bitstreeem!  Thank you!

What an obscure little Sci-Fi Gem....

This is cool beyond words!

Thanks for the up.

More faithful to the novel than the '80s version but Edmond O'Brien, a fine actor, is mis-cast as Winston Smith (over weight & American, two things Smith isn't). Gripe aside, this is a decent adaptation and infinitely better than the total mess John Hurt got involved with.

Hey, thanks for the comments.  Your right in that this is more faithful to the book, but O'Brien is totally miscast in this.  I have the other version, but it is sooo brooding that it really isn't one of my faves.  I know it's a brooding subject, but it's tough for me to watch it...=)  

In any case thanks again for the comments all and...

Enjoy!
OP, thanks much for this.  It isn't legally available anywhere now.
